  2. Girl groups
  3. KHAN

Minju

Euna Kim

Introduction

KHAN (칸) was a South Korean duo, which consisted of Minju and Euna Kim who both were former members of The Ark. They have shown attention-grabbing chemistry in the past before when they released ‘Goodbye Rain‘ before the official formation of KHAN. KHAN's debut song is "I'm Your Girl?".
